languages.text: "И что же вам нужно от меня?" {n}Маражай говорит притворно лениво.{/n} "От дракона, свергнутого с вершины и изгнанного из рядов воинов Опустошительной бури? От друкари, которого исторгла сама Комморра?"

traits.locale_text: "И что же кабалу нужно от меня?" {n}Маражай говорит притворно лениво.{/n} "От дракона, свергнутого с вершины и изгнанного из рядов воинов? От друкари, которого исторгла сама Комморра?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "So what do you want from me?" {n}Marazhai speaks with feigned indolence.{/n} "From a Dracon cast down from his post and banished from the ranks of the Reaving Tempest? From a Drukhari banned from Commorragh itself?"
languages.original_text: "И что же вам нужно от меня?" {n}Маражай говорит притворно лениво.{/n} "От дракона, свергнутого с вершины и изгнанного из рядов воинов Опустошительной бури? От друкари, которого исторгла сама Комморра?"

traits.locale_text: "So what do you want from me?" {n}Marazhai speaks with a mocking laziness.{/n} "From a Dracon cast down from his post and banished from the ranks of the Reaving Tempest? From a Drukhari banned from Commorragh itself?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So what do you want from me?" {n}Marazhai speaks with a mocking laziness.{/n} "From a Dracon cast down from his post and banished from the ranks of the Reaving Tempest? From a Drukhari banned from Commorragh itself?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So what do you want from me?" {n}Marazhai speaks with feigned indolence.{/n} "From a Dracon cast down from his post and banished from the ranks of the Reaving Tempest? From a Drukhari banned from Commorragh itself?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So what do you want from me?" {n}Marazhai speaks with feigned indolence.{/n} "From a Dracon cast down from his post and banished from the ranks of the Reaving Tempest? From a Drukhari banned from Commorragh itself?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So what do you want from me?" {n}Marazhai speaks with feigned indolence.{/n} "From a Dracon cast down from his post and banished from the ranks of the Reaving Tempest? From a Drukhari banned from Commorragh itself?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Und was wollt Ihr von mir?" {n}Marazhai spricht mit gespielter Trägheit.{/n} "Von einem Dracon, der gestürzt und aus den Reihen des plündernden Sturms ausgeschlossen wurde? Von einem Drukhari, der aus Commorragh selbst verbannt wurde?"
languages.original_text: "So what do you want from me?" {n}Marazhai speaks with feigned indolence.{/n} "From a Dracon cast down from his post and banished from the ranks of the Reaving Tempest? From a Drukhari banned from Commorragh itself?"

traits.locale_text: "Und was wollt Ihr von mir?" {n}Marazhai spricht mit gespielter Trägheit.{/n} "Von einem Dracon, der gestürzt und aus den Reihen des plündernden Sturms ausgeschlossen wurde? Von einem Drukhari, der aus Commorragh selbst verbannt wurde?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “那你想从我这里得到什么？”{n}玛拉斋装出一副慵懒的样子。{/n}“我被罢黜了裁决官的职位，被逐出了狂风阴谋团，还被赶出了科摩罗。你想从我这样的人手里得到什么？”
languages.original_text: "So what do you want from me?" {n}Marazhai speaks with feigned indolence.{/n} "From a Dracon cast down from his post and banished from the ranks of the Reaving Tempest? From a Drukhari banned from Commorragh itself?"

traits.locale_text: “那你想从我这里得到什么？”{n}玛拉斋装出一副慵懒的样子。{/n}“我被罢黜了裁决官的职位，被逐出了狂风阴谋团，还被赶出了科摩罗。你想从我这样的人手里得到什么？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Alors, qu'attendez-vous de moi ? » {n}La voix de Marazhai se drape d'une indolence feinte.{/n} « D'un Dracon destitué et expulsé des rangs de la Tempête ravageuse ? D'un Drukhari banni de Commorragh ? »
languages.original_text: "So what do you want from me?" {n}Marazhai speaks with feigned indolence.{/n} "From a Dracon cast down from his post and banished from the ranks of the Reaving Tempest? From a Drukhari banned from Commorragh itself?"

traits.locale_text: « Alors, qu'attendez-vous de moi ? » {n}La voix de Marazhai se drape d'une indolence feinte.{/n} « D'un Dracon destitué et expulsé des rangs de la Tempête ravageuse ? D'un Drukhari banni de Commorragh ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¿Y qué quieres de mí?». {n}Marazhai habla con indolencia fingida.{/n} «¿Qué quieres de un Dracón despojado de su cargo y expulsado de las filas de la Tempestad Asoladora? ¿De un Drukhari desterrado de la propia Commorragh?».
languages.original_text: "So what do you want from me?" {n}Marazhai speaks with feigned indolence.{/n} "From a Dracon cast down from his post and banished from the ranks of the Reaving Tempest? From a Drukhari banned from Commorragh itself?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y qué quieres de mí?». {n}Marazhai habla con indolencia fingida.{/n} «¿Qué quieres de un Dracón despojado de su cargo y expulsado de las filas de la Tempestad Asoladora? ¿De un Drukhari desterrado de la propia Commorragh?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「で、俺に何を求めてるんだ？」{n}マラズハイはわざとけだるそうに話す。{/n}「ドラコンとして、その地位から引きずりおろされて略奪の嵐から追放されろってか？デュカーリとして、コモラフの地から追い出されろってか？」
languages.original_text: "So what do you want from me?" {n}Marazhai speaks with feigned indolence.{/n} "From a Dracon cast down from his post and banished from the ranks of the Reaving Tempest? From a Drukhari banned from Commorragh itself?"

traits.locale_text: 「で、俺に何を求めてるんだ？」{n}マラズハイはわざとけだるそうに話す。{/n}「ドラコンとして、その地位から引きずりおろされて略奪の嵐から追放されろってか？デュカーリとして、コモラフの地から追い出されろってか？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ne istiyorsun benden peki?" {n}Marazhai, sahte bir uyuşuklukla konuşuyor.{/n} "Mevkisinden olmuş, Müfteris Kasırga saflarından kovulan bir Drakon'dan... Doğrudan Commorragh'tan kovulan bir Drukhari'den ne istiyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "So what do you want from me?" {n}Marazhai speaks with feigned indolence.{/n} "From a Dracon cast down from his post and banished from the ranks of the Reaving Tempest? From a Drukhari banned from Commorragh itself?"

traits.locale_text: "Ne istiyorsun benden peki?" {n}Marazhai sahte bir uyuşuklukla konuşuyor.{/n} "Mevkiinden edilen ve Müfteris Kasırga saflarından kovulan bir Drakon'dan? Direkt Commorragh'tan kovulan bir Drukhari'den?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
